Francesca Simons is a leading, fine jewelry publicist located in New York, representing luxury US and European fine jewelry brands.

FSPR is seeking a highly motivated and organized Part/ Full -Time Junior Publicist to support our editorial team in managing press opportunities and projects for our clients. This role focuses on pitching to secure product placements, tracking press coverage, and developing creative strategies to elevate our jewelry clients in the media landscape. This is a part / full - time position based in New York, NY, with flexible scheduling. The ideal candidate excels at managing deadlines and possesses strong media pitching skills.

Requirements:
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in fashion / accessories PR
- Strong pitching abilities- Previous editorial relationships required
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Detail-oriented with excellent time management and organizational abilities
- Proactive, resourceful and able to multitask in a fast-paced environment
- Takes initiative and thinks outside the box
- Interest in fine jewelry and accessories

Responsibilities:
Creative Pitching & Strategy
- Brainstorm and execute innovative pitching to increase client visibility.
- Assist senior team members in distributing look books, trend pitches, and press materials.
- Support the coordination and promotion of client events, trunk shows, and FSPR press previews.
- Conduct regular market check-ins with media to identify new pitching opportunities.

Sample & Image Requests
- Manage editorial sample and image requests across print and digital platforms.
- Serve as a liaison between clients and media, ensuring timely sample deliveries and returns.
- Maintain accurate records of sample loans, outstanding items, and seasonal placements.
- Track and log sample movement using internal databases.

Press Monitoring & Media Relations
- Monitor and clip press coverage daily.
- Maintain and update the master media and influencer contact list.
- Build and nurture relationships with editors to maximize media opportunities.

Events & Press Previews
- Assist in curating targeted media invite lists for seasonal press previews and client events.
- Support event logistics, including RSVP management and onsite coordination.
- Track and compile post-event press coverage, including social media placements.

Start Date - ASAP Cover letters and Resumes to be submitted to the email below:
Harper@francescasimons.com
